display_long_description:
The furnace roars, Kubs materialize. Your rival appears across the arena. Your powerful flying Robik approaches you, awaiting your command.

STACKAAR is a unique Mixed Reality duel that lets you pilot a high-performance Robik in the future of combat. Move your body to hunt, stack, and forge your way to victory in a high-stakes battle of strategy and nerve.

Step into the arena and get ready for:

 DIRECT BODY CONTROL -- Pilot your Robik with your own physical movements. Weave, dodge, and guide your machine to its target with unparalleled immersion.

 HIGH-STAKES STACKING -- Hunt down glowing Kubs and stack them as high as you dare. The bigger the risk, the greater the reward when you forge your weapon.

 FORGE-FIRE ASSAULT -- With the tap of a button, melt your entire stack into a single, destructive Energy Orb and launch it at your opponent for an explosive takedown.

 INTENSE DUELS -- Go head-to-head against another player in a pure test of skill where every move counts. No teammates, no excuses.

STACKAAR -- a game of high stacks and even higher stakes.
